Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: EAMON CS 1.4 GENERAL HELP.

1. Commands may be abbreviated on the left or right side. Examples: "A DR" or "A GON" for ATTACK DRAGON, "REQ RAY FROM AL" or "REQ GUN FROM IEN" for REQUEST RAY GUN FROM ALIEN, "PUT PUM IN LAR" or "PUT PIE IN OVEN" for PUT PUMPKIN PIE IN **039

2. Sometimes items may be in a room but won't show up until you EXAMINE them. Pay close attention to all descriptions. Note: LOOK only repeats the room description and -nothing- else. Use EXAMINE to, well, examine things. **040

3. Before you can manipulate items that are inside of, under or behind other items, you must REMOVE them from that item. There is no REMOVE ALL command, but if you ATTACK a (breakable) container, all of its contents will be emptied to the **041

4. Type SAVE and a number for a desired save position to Quick Save (save without having to verify). Adding a description will rename that slot. Examples: "SAVE 2" or "SAVE 5 Dark Room (NO GRUES)". Also works with RESTORE. (Type RESTORE 1, etc.)

5. You can INVENTORY companions (normally anyone whom, when you SMILE, smiles back at you) to see what they are carrying and wearing. You can then REQUEST those items from them. You can also INVENTORY certain containers to get a list of contents.
6. If you GIVE food or a beverage to a friend, they will take a bite or drink and give it back to you.

7. To give money to someone, type GIVE and an amount. For example, GIVE 1000 TO IRS AGENT would pay 1000 gold coins to the nice IRS Agent. In most standard adventures, if you GIVE 5000 or more, a neutral monster will -usually- become your friend.
8. The POWER spell has been known to have strange and marvelous effects in many adventures. When all else fails (or just for fun) try POWER.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: EAMON CS 1.4 NEW COMMANDS.
1. The GO command allows you to travel through any door/gate you encounter, including those that are free-standing (not associated with a room directional link).

2. The SETTINGS command allows you to change a variety of configuration options, which are persisted across saved games. The settings available and their effects on gameplay can vary between adventures, so trying this command is usually helpful.

3. The LOOK, EXAMINE, REMOVE and PUT commands have been enhanced to work with prepositions. You can LOOK or EXAMINE [in|on|under|behind] [container] to get a list of contents and then REMOVE or PUT [item] [in|on|under|behind] [container] **042

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: What do I do in the Norse mural room?
1. Cast the POWER spell to gain a hidden treasure.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: What do I do with the Hammer of Thor?
1. SAY THOR (or USE HAMMER) to reduce the courage of your enemies by 3/4.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: What do I do about the Emerald Warrior?
1. If you don't want to fight him, GIVE OBSIDIAN SCROLL CASE to him.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: Help! I had an unrequested gender change!
1. Keep casting the POWER spell until your gender reverts to normal (20% chance each time).

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: My torch keeps running out!
1. OPEN BACKPACK then REMOVE TORCH# FROM BACKPACK and use that as a light source after the first torch runs out.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: What do I do with Bozworth?
1. GIVE 100 to him twice to get two healing potions. After that you can just ignore him. Note: If you act hostile towards him, he will disappear before he can be harmed.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: All secrets of the Training Ground revealed. (Spoiler alert!)
Note: The following will give away everything about this adventure. Read on only if you are sure that you are done playing or don't wish to explore this adventure anymore.
First off, read all of the other hints, as the information that is in them won't be repeated here.

...Some minor text changes in parts of the game depending upon the character's gender; GIVE RAPIER TO JACQUES and he will thank you; READ PLAIN SCROLL to get a temporary 250% increase in your BLAST ability with a permanent 10% increase included;

...Aside from specials mentioned in other hints, the POWER spell has a 40% chance of giving your character a +2 Charisma increase and a 5% chance of having them struck by lightning; there are five rooms where you can READ GRAFFITI for amusing messages;
...Zapf the Conjurer has a 15% chance every turn of suddenly teleporting those who have died and/or chosen to flee during combat into the room;
...GET PURPLE BOOK in the library to reveal a secret passage; EXAMINE CHEST in the room where you find the rogue who stole Jacques rapier to make it appear and OPEN it to reveal valuable treasures.
